title: The word 'Authority' means Municipal Commissioner of Municipal Corporation, Chief Officer of Municipal Council, Metropolitan Commissioner of Metropolitan Development Authority or Chief Executive Officer of the concerned Authority
clause_text: The word 'Authority' means Municipal Commissioner of Municipal Corporation, Chief Officer of Municipal Council, Metropolitan Commissioner of Metropolitan Development Authority or Chief Executive Officer of the concerned Authority.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-
